plot: When a soldier goes on the run to escape military prison, he teams up with a loud mouth drug runner. Together they must overcome a deadly biker gang, a ruthless bounty hunter and a zealous DEA agent as they attempt to escape down to Mexico.
title: Run to the Horizon
plot_es: When a soldier goes on the run to escape military prison, he teams up with a loud mouth drug runner. Together they must overcome a deadly biker gang, a ruthless bounty hunter and a zealous DEA agent as they attempt to escape down to Mexico.
plot_en: When a soldier goes on the run to escape military prison, he teams up with a loud mouth drug runner. Together they must overcome a deadly biker gang, a ruthless bounty hunter and a zealous DEA agent as they attempt to escape down to Mexico.
